alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Bexar; Frio; Karnes; Medina; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:55PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Medina, western Karnes, northeastern Frio, Atascosa, Wilson and Bexar Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1055 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from North Pearsall to 6 miles northeast of Somerset to near Poth. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Schertz, Pleasanton, Pearsall, Floresville, Devine, Jourdanton, Poteet, Karnes City, Castroville, Poth, Charlotte, Stockdale, Christine, Kosciusko, Stinson Municipal Airport, Leon Valley, Kirby, Alamo Heights and Windcrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
